summary: Skyrim is a better place without her.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This simple mod removes Braith from game.[/size]
[size=3]It will obviously effect your gameplay.[/size]

[color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Automatically with manager or manually dragging the esp to your data folder.

[/size]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#b6d7a8][size=5]Braith: [/size][/color][color=#f4f4f4][size=4]BATTLEBORN, give me your money![/size]
[/color][color=#b6d7a8][size=5]
Lars: [/size][/color][size=4]SOMEONE HELP MEEE!  

[/size][i]PROTOLOGOLUS comes out from nowhere!

[/i][color=#b6d7a8][size=5]Protologolus: [/size][/color][size=4]Alright my child, this should help. 

[/size][/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][i][size=5]MAGICAL SOUND EFFECTS
[/size][/i]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#a4c2f4][size=5][i]Protologolus somehow removes Braith to death and now Skyrim can take a good breath(meanwhile Lars is crying of happiness).[/i][/size][/color][/font]
author: ProtologolusX
